TopicTitle: Existing mod to enable thermal debug data automatically?

Articles.Content:
I mean the option in debug menu to show thermal data on right click menu.

Really I want to just default it to true. I know it's easy mod, but is there any existing one? I know regex has done a similar one but that's bundling it with F11 (which I don't want), plus it's like adding a new AppLaunch menu and I still need to click. I just want to set the thermal data on automatically upon game init and forget about it.

If no such thing yet, I'll probably just write one on my own, and if people show interest I can post.
This mod advertises improved the overlay colors but I think it also adds temperatures to the right click menu - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/123967
Thermal Monitor adds part/skin temperature and heating rate to RClick menu instead of just the raw values
